Nightlight/Windlord::

Nightlight moved where Windlord was and they looked the battle among 
Clash and Aerotaur. Nightlight was worried...


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He whipped his head around to look at Clash.  As Clash flew at 
him he 
> launched himself backward the blades leaving narrow lines of mech 
fluid on 
> his chest.  He quickly drew his staff and made a retaliatory slash.
